To have access to the most recent version of the MAIDEN-iso model, please, **ask to the contacts in the contact page**

Otherwise, the last published version of the model is available on Zenodo and makes reference to the following paper:

Hermoso de Mendoza, I., Boucher, E., Gennaretti, F., Lavergne, A., Andreu-Hayles, L., & Field, R. (in review). A new snow module improves predictions of isotope-enabled MAIDENiso forest growth model. Geoscientific Model Development Discussions, 2021, 1‚Äì35. doi: 10.5194/gmd-2021-275 (https://gmd.copernicus.org/preprints/gmd-2021-275/)

Here you find the Zenodo links to the MAIDENiso code:

- **Version without snow** (https://zenodo.org/record/5598076)
- **Version with the new snow module** (https://zenodo.org/record/5597877)
- Data of Hermoso de Mendoza et al. 2021 (https://zenodo.org/record/5599091)

**The maidentools R package to handle and process MAIDEN results is now released**: [download here](documents/maidentools_1.0.2.tar.gz)

To Install packages from local source visit the following link https://riptutorial.com/r/example/5556/install-package-from-local-source
